article.title: Northrop to Convert Vertical Takeoff and Landing Unmanned Aerial Vehicles
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, Aerospace Systems Unmanned Systems, San Diego, California, is being awarded a $42 million contract modification to convert eight Army Vertical Takeoff and Landing Tactical Unmanned Aerial Vehicles to Navy configuration.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
